BIO

• Versatile, innovative and analytical professional
• Interested in pursuing a challenging career in information technology development
• Skilled in various aspects of programming and robotics while contributing technical expertise by joining coding competitions
• Active team player with the organizational capability to identify appropriate design and solutions toward corporate advancement
• Well-versed in maintaining relationships with various individuals, along with bilingual fluency in English and Farsi and working knowledge of French and Arabic

Digital Marketing Specialist    2019

Christine & Company Real Estate, Seattle, United States

• Worked closely with Christine & Company's managing partners to ensure meeting the long and short term marketing goals of the company

• Managed the company's YouTube channel on the back end daily and added tags and titles to videos based on SEO principles and using tools like Keyword Research, VidIQ, TubeBuddy, etc
• Designed a description template and used it to write the description of each video
• Implemented and automated the process of optimizing each YouTube video which resulted in an average increase in each video's SEO score of 40% (according to VidIQ)
• Organized, prioritized and kept track of the company objectives using project management tools such as Trello
• Implemented first SEO-driven organic strategy which boosted the company's YouTube videos' views by an average of 10% in 4 months
• Monitored and studied the competition’s (other real estate companies) content and strategies and applied the best practices on Christine & Company's YouTube channel

Volunteer    2017

University of Toronto Students' Union, Ontario, Canada

• Performed various tasks in foodbanks, festivals, associations and charity organizations including distributing food, financial planning for a ceremony, setting up the stage, etc.

• Participated in UofT's community, Through UTSU’s Blue Crew Program
• Developed vital skills, made connections with others and engaged in meaningful ways

Programming Tutor    2015-2016

Allameh Helli High School, Tehran, Iran

• Tutoring: Used variety of teaching techniques to encourage students to apply their critical thinking and participate in the discussion in the 10th grade C++ programming course

• Coordinated after-school tutoring hours with other teachers to help students in need of extra attention
• Assisted students with anti-virus program installations and virus removals
• Completed troubleshooting and repair when workstations had problems
